A toothbrush can be used to clean hard-to-reach areas like grout lines or crevices in jewelry.
A toothbrush can be used as a tool to remove dirt and debris from around faucets and drains.
A toothbrush can be used to clean the grooves of vinyl records or CDs to improve sound quality.
A toothbrush can be used as a tool to clean and shape the bristles of other brushes or tools.
A toothbrush can be used to clean and remove dirt and debris from around the eyes or between the eyebrows.
